attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I bought my pet shop business in July 08
The business itself is doing very well now but cashflow is difficult.  I do not have the rent for my business premises which is due on the 25th March.
I need £4,600 or I will have to close by the end of March.No-one will help me.

rejection.details: Your petition needs to be a clear call to action that relates to government policy rather than an individual. However, you may find some useful information at www.realhelpnow.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
